entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 10:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -17.3°C
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
